glsa.title: PDFlib: Multiple overflows in the included TIFF library
glsa.synopsis: PDFlib is vulnerable to multiple overflows, which can potentially lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: PDFlib is a library providing functions to handle PDF files. It includes a modified TIFF library used to process TIFF images.

description.p: The TIFF library is subject to several known vulnerabilities (see GLSA 200410-11). Most of these overflows also apply to PDFlib.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or web application to process a carefully crafted PDF file or TIFF image using a PDFlib-powered program. This can potentially lead to the execution of arbitrary code with the rights of the program processing the file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
